content: Per this Zulip thread (poll at the bottom), this PR renames nondiscrete_normed_field to nontrivially_normed_field. It will (silently) rot quickly whenever people do anything new involving nondiscrete normed fields, so it would be nice if it were merged relatively quickly.
Lucky that you got the 5^6 th PR
Ha, I hadn't even considered it. Hope I didn't steal it from anybody.
Big conflict with #15619 as expected. Oh well :laughing:
